text: ya 'ayuha alnaas durib mathal fastamieuu lah wtdbrwh: 'iina al'asnam walandad alty tebdwnha min dun allah lan tuqadar mujtamieatan ealaa khalq dhbabt wahdt, fkyf bikhalq ma hu akbr? wala tuqadar 'an tastakhlis ma yslbh aldhubab mnha, fahal baed dhlk min eajz? fhma deyfan meana: daeuf altaalib aldhy hu almebwd min dun allah 'an ystnqdh ma 'akhdhah aldhubab mnh, wdaeuf almatlub aldhy hu aldhbab, fkyf tuttakhdh hadhih al'asnam walandad alht, wahi bhdha alhwan?
